move(char[][]) - Method in class dkeep.logic.Character
Abstract method that is responsible for moving a character in the level's table.
move(char[][]) - Method in class dkeep.logic.Guard
Gets the direction the guard should move in according to its movement strategy and updates its position using that direction.
move(char[][]) - Method in class dkeep.logic.Hero
 
move(char[][]) - Method in class dkeep.logic.Ogre
Gets the direction the ogre should move in according to both its movement strategy and the level's table (ogre must move into a free tile).
MovementStrategy - Interface in dkeep.logic
This interface represents a movement strategy for a character.
